It "has made China more prosperous, the people happier, and society more stable, which is China's contribution to world peace and development in its own right," said the white paper titled "China's Epic Journey from Poverty to Prosperity." "A moderately prosperous society in all respects is a society in which all people share the fruits of development, a society where no individual, region or ethnic group is left behind, and a society that promotes the well-rounded development of all," it added.
